#define ll long long
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
ll a[103];
ll b[103];
ll mabs(ll a)
{
	if(a>0)return a;
	return -a;
}
ll doit()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	ll ans=1000000000000000ll;

	for(int i=0;i<n;++i)scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
	for(int i=0;i<n;++i)scanf("%lld", &b[i]);

	sort(a, a+n);
	sort(b, b+n);

	for(int pos=0;pos<n;++pos)
	{
		ll lans=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
		{
			lans+=mabs(b[i] - a[(i+pos)%n]);
		}
		ans=min(ans, lans);
	}
	return ans;

}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	int i=1;
	while(t--)
	{
		printf("Case %d: %lld\n", i, doit());
		i++;
	}
	return 0;
}
